title: Everyone has a story by Savi Sharma
description:
Title: Everyone has a story by Savi Sharma

Format: EPUB, AZW3

Meera, a fledgling writer who is in search of a story that can touch millions of lives.
Vivaan, assistant branch manager at Citibank, who dreams of travelling the world.
Kabir, a cafÃ© manager who desires something of his own.
Nisha, the despondent cafÃ© customer who keeps secrets of her own.
Everyone has their own story, but what happens when these four lives are woven together?
Pull up a chair in Kafe Kabir and watch them explore friendship and love, writing their own pages of life from the cosy cafÃ© to the ends of the world
